post1.text: I agree! The schools in my area have the same problem. We need more government funding for education infrastructure.

post1.author: Anonymous
post1.text: Maybe we could organize a community initiative to help repair some of the most urgent cases?

post2.author: Anonymous
post2.text: This is a critical issue. My grandmother had to be carried on a makeshift stretcher for 15km to reach medical help last year.

post3.author: Anonymous
post3.text: We also need internship programs with major companies to give youth work experience.

post3.author: Anonymous
post3.text: Digital skills training should be a priority too. The tech sector offers many opportunities.

post3.author: Anonymous
post3.text: Entrepreneurship education would help young people create their own jobs.
